s.text: A separate set of HEL cell cultures was inoculated with lung homogenate of dexamethasone-immunosuppressed, non-infected rats to serve as non-infected (mock-infected) control.
The sections reacted with the sense probe served as a control for non-specific background signal.
3(SPB probe, S), tissue sections (NRL or PcIRL) reacted with the SP-B sense probe showed no hybridization signal.
